EmailTemplate.name: Thank you email for BI India Contact us form
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for your interest in DuPont
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Thank you for your interest in DuPont, your question is being forwarded to the appropriate person who will contact you directly. To inquire about the progress of your inquiry, please call our toll free enquiry line (400 88 51 888) advising that you have already submitted an inquiry on dupont.com
